verbs.description: [ARG0: U.S. officials] [V: crossed] [ARG1: into North Korea] [ARGM-TMP: on Sunday] [ARGM-PRP: to hold talks on preparations for a possible summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean dictator Kim Jong - Un] .
[ARG0: U.S. officials] crossed into North Korea on Sunday to [V: hold] [ARG1: talks on preparations for a possible summit between President Donald Trump and North Korean dictator Kim Jong - Un] .
